en-US.cache.info.title: ğŸ’¡ Instructions
en-US.cache.info.line1: Display latest 10 cache records (sorted by creation time descending)
en-US.cache.info.line2: Each cache contains: user input, recognized skill, execution parameters, creation time
en-US.cache.info.line3: Cache is valid in current session, will clear after page refresh
en-US.cache.info.line4: When user input is the same, directly use cache result to speed up execution
en-US.cache.info.line5: Valid cache: cache records that have not expired and can be used
en-US.cache.info.line6: Expired: cache beyond 30 days, will be cleaned up on next startup or access
en-US.cache.info.line7: Cache capacity: save maximum 50 records, auto delete oldest using FIFO when exceeded

en-US.cache.msg.clearConfirm: Are you sure to clear all cache? This operation cannot be undone.
